sections.title: Opening (≤20s)
lines: Hi, I’m {{repName}} with Cascade Tree Works.
We’re in the neighborhood today checking tree health and safety.
Do you have a minute for me to point something out?
sections.notes: Keep it under 20s; step back from door.

sections.title: If Interested → Lead
lines: Great! Can I get your name and the best number?
We’ll schedule a free arborist assessment—no pressure.

sections.title: If Neutral → Left Literature
lines: No problem—I’ll leave a brochure so you have our info if you ever need us.

sections.title: If Declined
lines: Understood—thanks for your time. Have a good {{dayPeriod}}.

rebuttals.response: Totally get it. If anything changes, we’re local and available.
I understand—I’ll leave a brochure for when it’s convenient.
Thanks for letting me know—I’ll mark it so we don’t knock again.
Smart to stay on top of it. If you ever want a second opinion, happy to help.
No worries—I’ll leave my card. Reach out whenever it suits you.
